name: ai-prototype-generator
description: AI-powered prototype generator with streaming generation and surgical editing

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend -- --coverage && npm run test:backend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:backend -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run build && npm run lint

author: AI Prototype Generator Team
